content: That's really helpful to know more about Kombu seaweed and Katsuobushi. I'll definitely make sure to use them correctly in the Tonkotsu Ramen recipe. By the way, have you heard about the new Korean BBQ place that just opened up downtown? I've been wanting to try it out and see how their kimchi stew compares to the one I had at the Korean BBQ place I went to last month.
